00025 #ifndef _DynLib_H__
00026 #define _DynLib_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00031 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE hInstance
00032 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) LoadLibrary( a )
00033 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) GetProcAddress( a, b )
00034 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) !FreeLibrary( a )
00035 
00036 struct HINSTANCE__;
00037 typedef struct HINSTANCE__* hInstance;
00038 
00039 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_LINUX
00040 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE void*
00041 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) dlopen( a, RTLD_LAZY | RTLD_GLOBAL)
00042 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) dlsym( a, b )
00043 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) dlclose( a )
00044 
00045 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_APPLE
00046 #    define DYNLIB_HANDLE CFBundleRef
00047 #    define DYNLIB_LOAD( a ) mac_loadExeBundle( a )
00048 #    define DYNLIB_GETSYM( a, b ) mac_getBundleSym( a, b )
00049 #    define DYNLIB_UNLOAD( a ) mac_unloadExeBundle( a )
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 namespace Ogre {
00053 
00065     class _OgreExport DynLib
00066     {
00067     protected:
00068         String mName;
00070         String dynlibError(void);
00071     public:
00076         DynLib( const String& name );
00077 
00080         ~DynLib();
00081 
00084         void load();
00087         void unload();
00089         const String& getName(void) const { return mName; }
00090 
00102         void* getSymbol( const String& strName ) const throw();
00103 
00104     protected:
00105 
00107         DYNLIB_HANDLE m_hInst;
00108     };
00109 
00110 }
00111 
00112 #endif
